patch:
diff --git a/package-lock.json b/package-lock.json
index fe900ad..0d44269 100644
Binary files a/package-lock.json and b/package-lock.json differ
diff --git a/package.json b/package.json
index d30acf3..59f6df2 100644
--- a/package.json
+++ b/package.json
@@ -26,7 +26,7 @@
   "dependencies": {
     "@actions/core": "^1.10.0",
     "@actions/github": "^6.0.0",
-    "@octokit/plugin-retry": "^6.0.0",
+    "@octokit/plugin-retry": "^7.1.0",
     "js-yaml": "^4.1.0",
     "lodash.isequal": "^4.5.0",
     "minimatch": "^9.0.3"
@@ -48,6 +48,5 @@
     "prettier": "^3.2.5",
     "ts-jest": "^29.1.2",
     "typescript": "^5.4.3"
-
   }
 }
diff --git a/src/labeler.ts b/src/labeler.ts
index a1f0ab9..550f64b 100644
--- a/src/labeler.ts
+++ b/src/labeler.ts
@@ -30,7 +30,7 @@ async function labeler() {
     return;
   }
 
-  const client: ClientType = github.getOctokit(token, {}, pluginRetry.retry);
+  const client: ClientType = github.getOctokit(token, { request: { retries: 3, retryAfter: 60 } });
 
   const pullRequests = api.getPullRequests(client, prNumbers);
